title: Lagging since Friday (ARURF?) & Updated client lag on returning to game lobby
body:
Since Friday, returning to game lobby in the updated client freezes.  I've since switched back to the old/legacy client.
also since Friday, have been experiencing lag (which hasn't happened to me before).  This has been happening so far only tested in A.R.U.R.F.   ARURF is very fun but there is lot of spamming.  Any clues as to how to avoid lag spikes and reconnects would be helpful.

Thanks.

Mac OS X ver 10.11.6

replies.body:
Based on the two issues you've reported, it sounds like a lot of this may be stemming from an *unstable connection* to our servers. I strongly recommend working through our [**Mac Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) to ensure you've configured your local network settings properly for League.

Let me know if this resolved your issues.
